name: Sencha Tea Sauce and Marinade
description: Use as a marinade, and also cook fish or chicken right in the sauce.
preparation: Add Tea and Minced Garlic to water. Let steep for 5 minutes.
Pour into a food processor (with Tea and Minced Garlic). Add remaining ingredients and blend until smooth.
tips: Combine with prepared Nourish Bouillon or Vegetable Bouillon to make it a simple broth, or add more intense flavours, like fresh lemon or ginger.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Toss with hearty greens, buckwheat noodles, or your favourite grain.
